"RoidMi, endless suprises! Have fun, it\'s yours!"
"Congratulations, you have won a green bar!"
"You have to love being eco-friendly! With little effort each day, we come closer to our goal!"
"Oh okay, you must know, that you can\'t earn more than one dream bar per day."
Congratulations, the roads are even more green!
"Congratulations, your smart driving left some footprint! Continue like this to have more fun!"
"Wow, you\'ve been driving more than 2 hours, you\'ll be on the leaderboard!"
"Wow, you have reached top rank! You must be feeling proud!"

to bring you the best experience!

To ensure the normal operation of the app
After configuration, press back button to return to this screen
Plug your RoidMi into the lighter socket
Please go to bluetooth settings to pair your phone with RoidMi
After pairing successfully, press back button to return to this screen.
Click to send a sound to detect whether the connection is successful
If you can\'t hear sound, change the frequency and retry
I heard the sound, go to next step
You can change the default player in the settings later
The car FM frequency for @ should be set at:
Set the recommended frequency on your radio.
Answer: Try replugging your RoidMi, then restart your bluetooth after 10 seconds, and search again.
Answer: Try replugging your RoidMi, then search again, and reconnect.
3) RoidMi is connected, but there\'s no sound!
Answer: Go to the app, set a frequency, and make sure you tune in to that frequency in your car\'s radio.
4) The music player is not my default one!
Answer: Go to app, and select your default music player from the option.
5) After selecting Auto Play, it doesn\'t start music automatically!
Answer: Go to phone settings, and make sure the app has all the permissions!
6) No effect after switching mode in options!
Answer: In order for an option to take effect, you have to restart the app and bluetooth!
7) I don\'t like the Auto Play mode!
Answer: Go to "Select player" screen, and switch off Auto Play from there.
8) I don\'t want the voice prompts!
Answer: Go to app\'s settings and disable voice prompts from there.
9) How can I switch RoidMi\'s colour?
Answer: Select "Colour" from the app\'s options and set your favourite colour from there.
10) My default player cannot handle Auto Play!
Answer: Please check if your player has the latest update installed, if not please update.
11) I can\'t use some music formats?
Answer: RoidMi does not handle software. It is likely your player\'s fault. Check again with another player.
Is RoidMi in range of the phone?
RoidMi works with your phone via Bluetooth, so the closer your phone is to the RoidMi, the better connection it will have.

If your phone can\'t find your RoidMi, check if the LED in the USB ports is on. If not, make sure your car lighter socket is compatible with the device and it has power. If it does, replugging the RoidMi will power on the device.
If RoidMi is powered on, and your phone can\'t find it, try restarting your Bluetooth. After a few seconds, search again for RoidMi.
What if RoidMi is paired with another phone in range?
In that case, you should turn off the other phone\'s bluetooth, and try reconnecting.
Reboot your phone, and/or restart the app.
Make sure the lighter socket is clean of any soot, and plug your RoidMi in after you clean it.
How to adjust the transmitting frequency correctly?
Search for a free frequency on your car, and then, when you find it, change the RoidMi\'s transmitting frequency within the app, and match the radio\'s frequency.
Why is it recommended that I find a free frequency?
Because the two frequencies would interfere, and you wouldn\'t be able to hear your music. Adjust your frequency accordingly.
What if the recommended frequency doesn\'t work?

The recommended frequency may not work in your city. Find a free frequency with around three free channels in between, tune in your RoidMi to the same channel, and using the feedback feature, we will change the recommended frequency for your city!
Are you sure you want to log out?
This will swap up and down buttons
RoidMi can directly control this player
The player configured successfully. Exit current player with long press, and open a new player.
The player configured successfully. Restart the app to take effect
